Someone asked for the movie "Scarlett", sort of like a 'GWTW-The Sequel'.
It was a (USA-TV) mini-series in 1994. It wasn't very well done, because, no doubt, anyone who cared about the tale saw it is a conitnuation of GWTW but without the cast and crew of the original.
I haven't heard of anyone bothering to duplicate that mess.
